Reviews: I traded in a lease vehicle as a trade with a payment for the following month. Instead of making the trade, they returned it as a lease to the lease grantor, leaving me owing the payment and miles, even though the contract was for a trade covering both, but to save themselves the wholesaler fees they cheated me and left me pending payments. After calls to their fianance department they refused to speak to me.

Had an issue with my moms CTS. they were able to help me out quick and easy. Also was looking for a vehicle for myself. They have other brands there and helped me into a vehicle I wanted. Wish i could afford a XTS, maybe one day lol. But great customer service!
